author: cmpilato
msg: Fix an API compatibility problem caused by passing an uninitialized
(svn_io_run_diff): Clarify that to get the default behavior, you
must pass NULL as the 'user_args' parameter.

author: danielsh
msg: Fix a compiler warning, 'assignment discards qualifiers from pointer
This is just the compiler complaining about having to implicitly
cast away 'const'. We don't write to what the pointer is pointing
to though (empty string "" in data segment), so it's just a cosmetic

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Move r31223 to 1.5.1 Approved section.
